ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Who created all things and fashioned them in good proportion;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The One Who created, and then made proper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who has created, and then proportioned it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who created all things and gave them due proportions,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who hath created and then proportioned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who hath created, and further, given order and proportion;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who has created (everything), and then proportioned it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [87:2]   Who created and proportioned, His creature, making it of well-proportioned parts, without irregularities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who createth) every thing that has a soul, (then disposeth) He created them with two hands, two feet, two eyes, two ears and with other organs too;
